subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Football
Suits and Litigation
Cheating
lead_paragraph: N.F.L.  fans miffed by the New England Patriots’ secret videotaping of opponents’ signals can boycott games or team merchandise, but they cannot seek legal damages for the taping, a United States appeals court ruled Wednesday.
snippet: N.F.L.  fans miffed by the New England Patriots’ secret videotaping of opponents’ signals can boycott games or team merchandise, but they cannot seek legal damages for the taping, a United States appeals court ruled Wednesday.
